issue.title: [Python] Ability to read from URL for pyarrow's read_feather
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6998](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6998). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See this [pandas issue](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/29055) for more info. Many of the pandas `read_format()` methods allow you supply a URL except for the `read_feather()` method. This would be a nice to have feature.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6998?focusedCommentId=16960184) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I think this is better as a pandas issue. We have avoided doing anything too magical in the pyarrow API

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6998?focusedCommentId=16960197) by Ryan McCarthy (mcginger):*
Thanks for the feedback! I'll look into submitting as PR or issue to pandas.
